__e: The fact that you have no idea what's going on in my life for the last month-- none.
You tell me me where he's been staying for the past month, tell me who else was targeted, and who he was with the day that he was killed.
Yeah, and five times in the last month I've invited you round to mine, or me to yours, and five times it's, "Can't, Bob", "Oh, no, Bob", "Won't, Bob." What's that about, eh?
I haven't been... I haven't been the best friend to you recently.
Like, I mean, everything with my family's been so crazy. But when you called today, it just felt like... Like I could breathe again.
It's all right, I know why you haven't been yourself lately.
I just wanted to tell you what a good job you've done for us the last year and a half.
I'm the one who's been in prison this last year, and you're the one who's messed up.
Seems you spent at least a couple days a week at his hotel over the last year, and... He didn't seem to have any record of you.
Look, look, what I'm trying to say is, even though you didn't know everything about my life this past year, that does not mean that you weren't a part of it.
After everything you've done for me this last year, if anyone deserves to be happy, it's you.
Well, hey, if I learned anything in the last year, doesn't matter what he is, it only matters who he is.
For my friend, on our last day on Earth.
But it just also happens to be the very last day
And who else has been in this room in the last day or so?
